Methods in jmortgage.payment that return PmtCalculator
 PmtCalculator CanadianPmtCalculator.setInterestRate(double interestRate)
          Returns a new CanadianPmtCalculator object with the passed-in interest rate value and the same interval, loan amount, and years values as the object on which setInterestRate was called.

          Sets the interest rate used to determine the payment.

          Returns a new CanadianPmtCalculator object with the passed-in interval value and the same loan amount, interest rate, and years values as the object on which setInterval was called.

          Returns a new DefaultPmtCalculator object with the passed-in interval value and the same loan amount, interest rate, and years values as the object on which setInterval was called.
 PmtCalculator PmtCalculator.setInterval(Interval interval)
          Sets the interval used to determine the payment.

          Returns a new DefaultPmtCalculator object with the passed-in loan amount value and the same interval, interest rate, and years values as the object on which setLoanAmt was called.
 PmtCalculator PmtCalculator.setLoanAmt(double loanAmt)
